using namespace std;

#define INF 0x3f3f3f3f
#define ll long long
#define MAXN 10010

const ll mod = 1000000007LL;

char str[MAXN];

ll exp_mod(ll a, ll b) {
    ll x=1LL,y=a;
    while (b>0LL) {
        if (b&1LL) x = (x*y)%mod;
        y = (y*y)%mod;
        b >>= 1;
    }
    return x;
}

ll calc(int x) {
    ll inv = exp_mod(25LL,mod-2LL);
    ll y = exp_mod(26LL,x+1);
    y = (y - 1LL + mod)%mod;
    y = (y*inv)%mod;
    y = (y - 1LL + mod)%mod;
    return y;
}

int main() {
    int nt,mn,n,L;
    ll ans,prod;
    scanf("%d",&nt);
    while (nt--) {
        scanf("%d %s",&L,str);
        n = strlen(str);
        mn = min(n,L);
        ans = 0LL;
        prod = 1LL;
        for (int i=0; i<mn; i++) {
            prod = (prod * (ll)(str[i]-'a'+1))%mod;
            if (i == mn-1 && L >= n) prod = (prod - 1LL + mod)%mod;
            ans = (ans + prod)%mod;
        }
        
        if (L > n) ans = (ans + prod*calc(L-n))%mod;
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    
    return 0;
}
